thread.title: GARY SUMMERS
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by GARY SUMMERS

author: GARY SUMMERS
title: GARY SUMMERS
text: I ordered a regular brood chamber and several regular depth foundation boards and received the order within three days. I received great assistance from a man at Brushy Mountain Bee Farm and got everything just in time for my nuc. Good products, fair prices and excellent personal assistance. Thank you.
